properties.name: host
properties.description: The address of the EFT Wrapper RestService

properties.name: port
properties.description: The port of the EFT Wrapper RestService

properties.name: context-path
properties.description: The path of the EFT Wrapper RestService endpoint

properties.name: proto
properties.description: The protocol of the EFT Wrapper RestService

properties.name: connect-timeout
properties.description: The maximum time to wait a response of the EFT Wrapper RestService endpoint. A timeout value of 0 specifies an infinite timeout.

properties.name: read-timeout
properties.description: The maximum time to read the response of the EFT Wrapper RestService endpoint. A timeout value of 0 specifies an infinite timeout.
